name: additive_cancellation
description: If a + c = b + c, then a = b

name: multiplicative_cancellation
description: If a × c = b × c and c ≠ 0, then a = b

name: inequality_antisymmetry
description: If a ≥ b and b ≥ a, then a = b

name: opposite_of_sum
description: For any numbers a, b: -(a + b) = (-a) + (-b)

name: opposite_of_product
description: For any numbers a, b: -(a × b) = (-a) × b = a × (-b)

name: cross_multiplication
description: If a/b = c/d then a×d = b×c for b,d ≠ 0

name: componendo
description: If a/b = c/d then (a+b)/b = (c+d)/d for b,d ≠ 0

name: dividendo
description: If a/b = c/d then (a-b)/b = (c-d)/d for b,d ≠ 0

name: componendo_dividendo
description: If a/b = c/d then (a+b)/(a-b) = (c+d)/(c-d) for a≠b, c≠d, b,d≠0

name: absolute_value_inequality_less
description: |x| < a iff -a < x < a for a > 0

name: absolute_value_inequality_greater
description: |x| > a iff x < -a or x > a for a > 0

name: set_reflexivity
description: For any set A: A ⊆ A

name: set_antisymmetry
description: If A ⊆ B and B ⊆ A, then A = B

name: universal_set_union
description: A ∪ U = U where U is universal set

name: power_set_property
description: ∅ ∈ P(A) and A ∈ P(A) for any set A

name: subset_union
description: A ⊆ B iff A ∪ B = B

name: subset_intersection
description: A ⊆ B iff A ∩ B = A

name: disjoint_sets
description: A and B disjoint iff A ∩ B = ∅

name: even_plus_even
description: Sum of two even integers is even

name: odd_plus_odd
description: Sum of two odd integers is even

name: even_plus_odd
description: Sum of even and odd integer is odd

name: even_times_integer
description: Product of even integer with any integer is even

name: odd_times_odd
description: Product of two odd integers is odd

name: product_roots_quadratic
description: For x² + px + q = 0, sum of roots = -p, product = q

name: transitive_divisibility
description: If a|b and b|c, then a|c

name: division_algorithm
description: For integers a,b>0, ∃! q,r: a = bq + r, 0≤r<b

name: congruence_symmetric
description: If a ≡ b mod m, then b ≡ a mod m

name: congruence_transitive
description: If a ≡ b mod m and b ≡ c mod m, then a ≡ c mod m

name: congruence_addition
description: If a ≡ b mod m and c ≡ d mod m, then a+c ≡ b+d mod m

name: congruence_multiplication
description: If a ≡ b mod m and c ≡ d mod m, then ac ≡ bd mod m

name: zero_product_inequality
description: If ab > 0, then a and b same sign; if ab < 0, opposite signs

name: multiplication_sign_rules
description: positive × positive = positive; negative × negative = positive; positive × negative = negative

name: division_sign_rules
description: positive ÷ positive = positive; negative ÷ negative = positive; positive ÷ negative = negative

name: inequality_addition_different_signs
description: If a > b, then a + c > b + c for any c

name: inequality_chain
description: If a < b < c, then a < c

name: strict_inequality_transitivity
description: If a < b and b < c, then a < c

name: logarithm_base_change
description: log_b(a) = log_c(a) / log_c(b) for a,b,c > 0, c ≠ 1

name: set_partition
description: A = (A - B) ∪ (A ∩ B) for any sets A,B

name: constant_function_property
description: If f(x) = c for all x, then f(a) = f(b) for all a,b

name: linear_function_property
description: f(x) = mx + b satisfies f(a) - f(b) = m(a - b)

name: quadratic_vertex
description: Vertex of ax²+bx+c is at x = -b/(2a)

name: sum_arithmetic_series
description: Sum of n terms: S_n = n/2 × (a_1 + a_n)

name: sum_geometric_series
description: Sum of n terms: S_n = a(1-r^n)/(1-r) for r ≠ 1

name: binomial_theorem
description: (a+b)^n = Σ[k=0 to n] C(n,k) a^{n-k} b^k

name: pigeonhole_principle
description: If n items in m containers, at least one container has ⌈n/m⌉ items

name: factorization_integers
description: Every integer >1 has unique prime factorization

name: greatest_common_divisor
description: gcd(a,b) = largest d such that d|a and d|b

name: least_common_multiple
description: lcm(a,b) = smallest m such that a|m and b|m

name: modular_arithmetic
description: a ≡ b mod m iff m|(a-b)

name: fermats_little_theorem
description: If p prime, a not divisible by p, then a^{p-1} ≡ 1 mod p

name: quadratic_residue
description: a is quadratic residue mod p if x² ≡ a mod p has solution

name: eulers_totient
description: φ(n) = number of integers < n coprime to n

name: mathematical_induction
description: If P(1) true and P(k)→P(k+1), then P(n) true ∀n

name: well_ordering_principle
description: Every non-empty set of positive integers has smallest element

name: archimedean_property
description: For any real x, ∃ integer n > x

name: density_rationals
description: Between any two reals, there is a rational number

name: triangle_angle_sum
description: Sum of interior angles in triangle is 180 degrees

name: pythagorean_theorem
description: In right triangle: a² + b² = c²
